name: Bybit Telegram Trading Bot
description: Advanced Telegram bot for automated Bybit trading with Enhanced TP/SL management, Mirror Trading, and AI-powered market analysis

BYBIT_API_KEY.description: Your Bybit API Key (with derivatives trading permission)

USE_TESTNET.description: Use Bybit testnet (true) or live trading (false)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API Key for AI features (optional but recommended)

ENABLE_GPT4_REASONING.description: Enable GPT-4 reasoning for enhanced market analysis

BYBIT_API_KEY_2.description: Second Bybit API Key for mirror trading (optional)

BYBIT_API_SECRET_2.description: Second Bybit API Secret for mirror trading (optional)

REDDIT_CLIENT_ID.description: Reddit API Client ID for sentiment analysis (optional)

REDDIT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Reddit API Client Secret for sentiment analysis (optional)

TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN.description: Twitter Bearer Token for sentiment analysis (optional)

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: YouTube Data API Key for sentiment analysis (optional)

CANCEL_LIMITS_ON_TP1.description: Cancel unfilled limit orders when TP1 hits

DYNAMIC_FEE_CALCULATION.description: Use dynamic fee rates instead of fixed

ENABLE_CIRCUIT_BREAKER.description: Enable circuit breaker for API protection

ENABLE_PERIODIC_MONITOR_CLEANUP.description: Enable automatic cleanup of stale monitors
